contextBefore.text: Yeah. I know, I know. "If you put your mind to it, you could accomplish anything."

contextAfter.text: Alright, okay, Jennifer. What if I send in the tape and they don't like it? I mean, what if they say I'm no good? What if they say, "Get outta here, kid, you got no future." I mean, I just don't think I can take that kind of rejection. (sighs) Jesus, I'm beginning to sound like my old man.
C'mon, he's not that bad. At least he's letting you borrow the car tomorrow night.

Check out that four by four. That is hot. Someday, Jennifer, someday. Wouldn't it be great to take that truck up to the lake? Throw a couple of sleeping bags in the back. Lie out under the stars. (sighs, admiring it longingly)

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
